title: 120th Problem 2016
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/IyALVwktBR-parallel-circuit.jpg?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given the parallel circuit above with the following values:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" { R }_{ 1 }=100\Omega \\ \\ { R }_{ 2 }=300\Omega \\ \\ { R }_{ 3 }=600\Omega \\ \\ { V }_{ T }=150V "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"  { P }_{ 3 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Power) of the circuit."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Part One."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Check out the set: 2016 Problems."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is part eight of a problem."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"As voltage is same across all resistors in parallel connection 
V=150
Now 
p3=V^2/R3
Where R3 is 600
So from here we get 37.5watt"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

title: Harmony Squared
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\dfrac{A}{B}=\\dfrac{\\left(\\dfrac{1}{2}\\right)^2+\\left(\\dfrac{1}{3}+\\dfrac{1}{6}\\right)^2+\\left(\\dfrac{1}{4}+\\dfrac{1}{8}+\\dfrac{1}{12}\\right)^2+\\left(\\dfrac{1}{5}+\\dfrac{1}{10}+\\dfrac{1}{15}+\\dfrac{1}{20}\\right)^2+\\cdots}{\\left(\\dfrac{1}{1}\\right)^2+\\left(\\dfrac{1}{2}+\\dfrac{1}{4}\\right)^2+\\left(\\dfrac{1}{3}+\\dfrac{1}{6}+\\dfrac{1}{9}\\right)^2+\\left(\\dfrac{1}{4}+\\dfrac{1}{8}+\\dfrac{1}{12}+\\dfrac{1}{16}\\right)^2+\\cdots}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The equation above holds true for positive coprime integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Find the arithmetic mean of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" n "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be an integer, are the numbers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" a = 21n+4  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" b = 14n+3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" relatively prime?"}]}]}
